## CalibrationQRCodesConfig.contentPrefix property

Prefix of the text to encode in the QR codes, before the position. Defaults to `viewport://`<!-- -->. Changing its value can be useful to distinguish multiple calibration images that are displayed in the same full image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
contentPrefix?: string;
```
